item.title: I don't trust computers. Am I a caveman?
item.description: My high school history teacher worked at a local bank once and he said some customers don’t trust the computers. They don’t trust money counting machines. They don’t trust ATMs. They are afraid of getting less money out of that metal machine than it records. These people are mostly seniors. Internet and computers wasn’t a big thing in their ages. Why a bank employee gave up his job for teaching high schoold kids?
